head.title: Create lists in {{FileFormatUp}} documents using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Easily design and embed dynamic lists into your {{FileFormatUp}} templates with {{ProdFullName}} API.

header.title: Add dynamic lists to {{FileFormatUp}} files with our {{EnvNameShort}} API
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides flexible tools to generate and insert data-rich lists directly into {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdFullName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to design professional documents by pulling data from multiple sources. Use it to create lists, tables, charts, or text, and place these elements exactly where needed using advanced template features. With support for over 50 formats, including PDFs, MS Office files, and email documents, it helps automate and streamline your workflow.

more_features.title: Generate documents from templates with data integration
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} simplifies adding dynamic lists, tables, charts, and other components into document templates.

feature_1.title: Build reports with data from various sources
feature_1.content: Use data from formats like JSON, XML, and CSV to populate lists and other components efficiently.

feature_2.title: Add lists and other data elements seamlessly
feature_2.content: {{ProdShortName}} enables embedding of lists, charts, tables, and more, alongside text, images, and links to create polished documents.

feature_3.title: Precisely control where data appears
feature_3.content: LINQ-based templates allow you to define exact locations for your lists and data. Use loops to create detailed lists automatically and apply custom formatting.

feature_4.title: Supports various document formats
feature_4.content: Create or edit files in formats such as MS Office, PDF, OpenOffice, HTML, and email. Merge content from multiple documents as needed.

formats.title: Produce documents in various formats
formats.description: {{EnvName}} supports over 50 formats, allowing you to create structured documents by combining data and templates.

operations.title: Discover what {{ProdShortName}} can do
operations.description: Easily design and generate content-rich documents with advanced data integration tools.

examples.comment_1: Include this tag in your template where the list should appear
examples.comment_2: Define the file path of the template
examples.comment_3: Pull data from your chosen source
examples.comment_4: Save the document with the embedded list

steps.title: How to add a data-driven list to a {{FileFormatUp}} document

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) lets you quickly insert data-rich lists into {{FileFormatUp}} templates. Customize and organize content effortlessly.
content.step_1: Create a {{FileFormatUp}} template and mark placeholder spots for the list.
content.step_2: Set the file path to the template.
content.step_3: Fetch data from supported formats like JSON or XML.
content.step_4: Save the final document with the list added.

code_1.title: How to create a list programmatically
code_1.content: This example shows how to add a list dynamically into a {{FileFormatUp}} file using {{ProdShortName}}.
code_1.comment_1: Add a placeholder tag in your template for the list
code_1.comment_2: Provide the file path to your template
code_1.comment_3: Pull the required data to populate the list
code_1.comment_4: Prepare the data source with the necessary details
code_1.comment_6: Save the output document with the completed list

texts_pdf.step_1: Design a template and specify placeholders for the list (PDF templates are not supported).
texts_pdf.step_4: Save the finished document with the list included as a PDF.
texts_pdf.comment_tmp: PDF templates are not supported at this time.
